parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The details of the filter condition.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the returned page. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the HaVip.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the HaVip belongs.
